interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 1513 by LA LA LEAF - All Natural Facial Cream, 750mg Quick Absorbing Hemp Moisturizer with Rosehip, Carrot Seed and Provitamin B5 - Smooths Wrinkles for Firm Glowing Skin - Paraben-free, Cruelty-free, Vegan
Review Date: 2020/10/13
Store: LA LA LEAF
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'LA LA LEAF', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 3.2 x 2 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: This cream will leave your skin glowing! I have always had an issue with oily skin and this cream made it oily x 10.  My skin did not feel softer, just oily.  There is no scent which i appreciate.  The black and white packaging is pretty.
Review Title: Be prepared for oily skin!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Vedory
['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
{'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
This one was a dud for me. Although the bracket did stay in place it made me look like an anteater. It only would work with certain masks. The plastic was hard, but looks like it would be easy to clean. I used a couple times, but have just gone back to not wearing anything.
Skip this face mask bracket

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest:** The user maintains a keen focus on beauty and self-care products, with an enhanced emphasis on skincare lotions that effectively address dryness while offering a visually appealing aesthetic. Recent experiences with creams have made them more aware of the balance between hydration and oiliness.

- **Quality Preference:** Their dedication to high-quality products continues to grow, driven by recent positive outcomes. The user firmly values functionality, particularly in products that enhance their skincare routine without compromising on performance.

- **Visual Appeal:** A commitment to aesthetic consistency is evident, as they favor beautifully packaged items that complement their beauty routine and align with their style. The user appreciates minimalistic and appealing packaging.

- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Their passion for DIY projects is evident, with a widening interest in personalization within beauty-related activities, reflecting a desire for creative expression in skincare and grooming.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user has become more discerning in their rating practices. They now reserve high ratings for products that meet their high expectations while providing constructive feedback for items that do not perform as desired. Recent experiences highlight their sensitivity to issues like excess oiliness alongside their appreciation for functional benefits.

In summary, this user is a creatively driven individual prioritizing high-quality beauty solutions that merge functionality with visual aesthetics, while adopting a critical lens toward their product evaluations.
